trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Penn Yan
There were no other sightings in Penn Yan on or around August 23rd 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was behind my grandparents car, and I was doing nothing else. My grandpa showed us the weird object. It made me feel weird and excited at the same time. I knew it was a UFO from the start! It was hovering,vibrating, all sorts of stuff!!! It also had a weird glow. It was shaped like a triangle and had 7 lights around it. There were 5 different colors. After the sighting, I didn't play Minecraft, I didn't do nothing! I went right on the nearest computer and reported that UFO sighting! That is my description of that weird sighting.
Summary: It was unnerving and awesome at the same time.
